public ref class Enumerable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 方法，用於查詢實作 的物件。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying objects that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別中的方法提供查詢資料來源實作的標準查詢運算子實作。The methods in this class provide an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 標準查詢運算子會遵循的一般用途方法[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，並讓您透過任何表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業。以.NET 為基礎的程式設計語言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 此類別中方法大多會定義為延伸的延伸模組方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend . 這表示它們可以實作任何物件上呼叫和執行個體方法一樣。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 傳回值序列的查詢中所使用的方法並不會耗用目標資料，直到列舉查詢物件。Methods that are used in a query that returns a sequence of values do not consume the target data until the query object is enumerated. 這稱為 「 延後執行 」。This is known as deferred execution. 傳回單一值的查詢中所使用的方法執行，而且會立即耗用目標資料。Methods that are used in a query that returns a singleton value execute and consume the target data immediately.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview

related.span: 擴充方法 (C# 程式設計手冊)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法輕鬆地透過一連串的值執行計算。The method makes it simple to perform a calculation over a sequence of values. 這個方法的運作方式是呼叫`func`每個項目中的一次`source`除了第一個。This method works by calling `func` one time for each element in `source` except the first one. 每次`func`呼叫時，中的順序，並彙總的值傳遞的項目 (做為第一個引數`func`)。Each time `func` is called, passes both the element from the sequence and an aggregated value (as the first argument to `func`). 第一個項目`source`做為初始的彙總值。The first element of `source` is used as the initial aggregate value. 結果`func`會取代先前的彙的總值。The result of `func` replaces the previous aggregated value. 傳回的最終結果`func`。 returns the final result of `func`. 這個多載方法不適合所有情況下，因為它使用的第一個元素`source`做為初始彙總的值。This overload of the method isn't suitable for all cases because it uses the first element of `source` as the initial aggregate value. 如果傳回的值應該包含的項目，您應選擇另一個多載`source`符合特定條件。You should choose another overload if the return value should include only the elements of `source` that meet a certain condition. 比方說，這個多載不可靠，如果您想要計算總和的中的偶數`source`。For example, this overload isn't reliable if you want to calculate the sum of the even numbers in `source`. 結果會是第一個項目是奇數，而不是甚至如果不正確。The result will be incorrect if the first element is odd instead of even. 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，標準查詢運算子也包含一般用途計數方法，還有四個數值彙總方法，也就是， ， ，和。To simplify common aggregation operations, the standard query operators also include a general purpose count method, , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由使用反轉的字串中的文字順序。The following code example demonstrates how to reverse the order of words in a string by using . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會傳回集合的所有項目。This method does not return all the elements of a collection. 相反地，它會判斷集合中的所有項目是否全都符合條件。Instead, it determines whether all the elements of a collection satisfy a condition. 列舉`source`可以判斷結果為已停止。The enumeration of `source` is stopped as soon as the result can be determined. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Aggregate Into All()`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into All()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來判斷序列中的所有項目是否全都符合條件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition. 變數`allStartWithB`為 true 以"B"開頭的所有的寵物名稱則`pets`陣列是空的。Variable `allStartWithB` is true if all the pet names start with "B" or if the `pets` array is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法沒有任何作用以外的其他變更的編譯階段型別`source`從型別可實作到本身。The method has no effect other than to change the compile-time type of `source` from a type that implements to itself. 可用於查詢實作時的順序實作之間做選擇，但也有一組不同的可用公用的查詢方法。 can be used to choose between query implementations when a sequence implements but also has a different set of public query methods available. 例如，指定泛型類別`Table`可實和具有它自己的方法，例如`Where`， `Select`，和`SelectMany`，呼叫`Where`會叫用公用`Where`方法`Table`.For example, given a generic class `Table` that implements and has its own methods such as `Where`, `Select`, and `SelectMany`, a call to `Where` would invoke the public `Where` method of `Table`. A`Table`型別，表示資料庫資料表可能會有`Where`接受述詞的引數之運算式樹狀架構，並將樹狀結構轉換成 SQL 中，遠端執行的方法。A `Table` type that represents a database table could have a `Where` method that takes the predicate argument as an expression tree and converts the tree to SQL for remote execution. 如果遠端執行不符預期，例如因為述詞會叫用的本機方法，方法可用來隱藏自訂方法，並改為提供的標準查詢運算子。If remote execution is not desired, for example because the predicate invokes a local method, the method can be used to hide the custom methods and instead make the standard query operators available. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用隱藏的類型的自訂`Where`時想要使用的標準查詢運算子實作的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use to hide a type's custom `Where` method when the standard query operator implementation is desired. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法可讓標準查詢運算子來叫用非泛型集合上提供必要的型別資訊。The method enables the standard query operators to be invoked on non-generic collections by supplying the necessary type information. 例如，不會實作，但藉由呼叫上物件時，標準查詢運算子可以再用來查詢的序列。For example, does not implement , but by calling on the object, the standard query operators can then be used to query the sequence. 如果項目無法轉換為類型`TResult`，此方法會擲回。If an element cannot be converted to type `TResult`, this method throws a . 來源序列，這個方法的，表示項目都有編譯時間靜態類型的`object`。The source sequence for this method is , which means the elements have the compile-time static type of `object`. 這個方法所執行的唯一類型轉換為參考轉換和 unboxing 轉換。The only type conversions that are performed by this method are reference conversions and unboxing conversions. 集合中的項目執行階段型別必須符合目標類型，或實值型別，如果項目執行階段類型必須是目標類型的 boxing 轉換的結果。The runtime type of the elements in the collection must match the target type, or in the case of value types, the runtime type of elements must be the result of a boxing conversion of the target type. 其他的轉換類型，例如不同的數值型別，不允許。Other conversion types, such as those between different numeric types, are not allowed. 若要取得只可以轉換成輸入的項目才`TResult`，使用方法，而非。To obtain only those elements that can be converted to type `TResult`, use the method instead of . 在查詢運算式中，明確指定型別的的反覆運算變數會轉譯成的引動過程。In a query expression, an explicitly typed iteration variable translates to an invocation of . 此範例顯示具有明確類型的範圍變數的語法。This example shows the syntax for an explicitly typed range variable. ```csharp from int i in objects ``` ```vb From i As Integer In objects ``` 使用`select`子句的查詢來執行其他的轉換類型，例如隱含數值轉換。Use the `select` clause of a query to perform other conversion types, like the implicit numeric conversions. 下列範例會使用這兩者`Cast`方法和`select`陳述式，以將一連串的 boxed 整數轉換成一連串的雙精度浮點數。The following example uses both the `Cast` method and a `select` statement to convert a sequence of boxed integers to a sequence of doubles. ```csharp IEnumerable sequence = Enumerable.Range(0, 10); var doubles = from int item in sequence select (double)item; ``` ```vb Dim sequence As IEnumerable = Enumerable.Range(0, 10) Dim doubles = From item As Integer In sequence Select CType(item, Double) ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用若要啟用的標準查詢運算子在。The following code example demonstrates how to use to enable the use of the standard query operators on an . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#19)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法會傳回未排序的序列，其中包含任何重複的值。The method returns an unordered sequence that contains no duplicate values. 它會使用預設相等比較子， ，來比較值。It uses the default equality comparer, , to compare values. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Distinct`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Distinct` clause translates to an invocation of . 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值的類型可實作泛型介面。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要實作這個介面，並提供您自己和類型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 如需使用的範例若要定義自訂比較子，請參閱。For an example that uses to define a custom comparer, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用從整數的序列傳回獨特的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return distinct elements from a sequence of integers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例的`GroupBy`，請參閱下列主題。For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics. > > - > - > - 方法傳回的集合物件，一個用於每個發現的相異索引鍵。The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是也具有其項目相關聯的索引鍵。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 物件產生根據順序中的項目順序`source`產生第一個索引鍵，每個。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 在群組中的項目中出現的順序產生`source`。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 預設相等比較子用來比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 在查詢運算式語法中， `group by` (Visual C#) 或`Group By Into`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, a `group by` (Visual C#) or `Group By Into` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 如需詳細資訊和使用方式範例，請參閱 < [group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)並[By 子句群組](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 預設相等比較子， ，用來雜湊及比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 產生階層式結果，這表示中的項目`outer`會與集合的相符項目配對`inner`。 produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 可讓您根據整組相符項目，每個項目結果`outer`。`GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each element of `outer`. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何相互關聯的項目，在`inner`給定項目的`outer`的相符項目順序會是空的但是仍然會出現在結果中。If there are no correlated elements in `inner` for a given element of `outer`, the sequence of matches for that element will be empty but will still appear in the results. `resultSelector`函式會呼叫一次，每個`outer`項目與所有集合`inner`相符的項目`outer`項目。The `resultSelector` function is called only one time for each `outer` element together with a collection of all the `inner` elements that match the `outer` element. 這不同於方法，在其中結果選取器函式會叫用包含一個項目配對`outer`和 從一個項目`inner`。This differs from the method, in which the result selector function is invoked on pairs that contain one element from `outer` and one element from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 保留的項目順序`outer`，和每個項目`outer`，從相符項目的順序`inner`。`GroupJoin` preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each element of `outer`, the order of the matching elements from `inner`. 在傳統的關聯式資料庫詞彙中有沒有直接的對等。 has no direct equivalent in traditional relational database terms. 不過，這個方法會實作內部聯結和左方外部聯結的超集。However, this method does implement a superset of inner joins and left outer joins. 這兩種作業可以撰寫以使用群組聯結。Both of these operations can be written in terms of a grouped join. 請參閱[聯結作業](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). 在查詢運算式語法中， `join … into` (Visual C#) 或`Group Join`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, a `join … into` (Visual C#) or `Group Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個序列執行群組的聯結。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a grouped join on two sequences. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#40)]

A 與 B 兩個集合的交集會定義為包含所有項目同時出現在 B，但沒有其他項目集。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 這個方法所傳回的物件列舉時，`Intersect`會產生不同的項目中兩個序列中出現的順序發生`first`。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, `Intersect` yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較類型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要覆寫而方法，並選擇性地實作自訂型別中的泛型介面。To compare a custom data type, you need to override the and the methods, and optionally implement the generic interface in the custom type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`Intersect(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`傳回項目出現在每個整數的兩個序列中。The following code example demonstrates how to use `Intersect(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 您實作這個介面之後，您可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的物件`Intersect`方法，如下列範例所示：After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `Intersect` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 預設相等比較子， ，用來雜湊及比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 聯結是指兩個來源的資訊，根據一般的索引鍵的項目建立相互關聯的作業。A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key. 將兩個資訊來源和相符的索引鍵用它們會一起其中一種方法呼叫中。 brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call. 這不同於使用`SelectMany`，這需要一個以上的方法呼叫來執行相同的作業。This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation. 保留的項目順序`outer`，和每個這些項目，相符項目的順序`inner`。 preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`. 在查詢運算式語法中， `join` (Visual C#) 或`Join`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, a `join` (Visual C#) or `Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 在關聯式資料庫規定，方法會實作內部等聯結。In relational database terms, the method implements an inner equijoin. 「 內部 」 表示只與另一個序列中有符合的項目都包含在結果中。'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results. 等聯結 ' 是聯結中的索引鍵比較是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左方外部聯結作業有沒有專用的標準查詢運算子，但可以使用來執行方法。A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the method. 請參閱[聯結作業](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行一般的索引鍵為基礎的兩個序列的內部聯結。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考和可為 null 類型的預設值是`null`。The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`. 方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用範例 > 一節中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上的空陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#45)] 有時值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 除了檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並將它如有必要變更，您可以使用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫取得最後一個項目。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值為 1，如果數字的每月天數的集合是空的。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 整數，預設值為 0，這未對應到任何一天的月份，因為預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成執行後不必要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二個結果變數使用取得的指定預設值為 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法會傳回這些元素中的`source`可以轉換為類型`TResult`。The method returns only those elements in `source` that can be cast to type `TResult`. 如果項目無法轉換為類型，而是收到例外狀況`TResult`，使用。To instead receive an exception if an element cannot be cast to type `TResult`, use . 這個方法是可以套用至集合，其中有一個非參數化型別，例如幾個標準查詢運算子方法的其中一個。This method is one of the few standard query operator methods that can be applied to a collection that has a non-parameterized type, such as an . 這是因為擴充類型。This is because extends the type . 無法只套用至為基礎的集合上參數化型別，但根據非參數化的集合也輸入。 cannot only be applied to collections that are based on the parameterized type, but collections that are based on the non-parameterized type also. 藉由套用至集合，實作，您就可以使用標準查詢運算子來查詢集合。By applying to a collection that implements , you gain the ability to query the collection by using the standard query operators. 例如，指定的類型引數來會傳回型別的物件`IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定識別函式 (`x => x` Visual C# 中或`Function(x) x`Visual Basic 中) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 若要擴充的型別定義兩個方法，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，讓您指定額外的排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 並`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或是的呼叫結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序，會忽略先前建立的順序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行的穩定的排序;亦即，如果兩個項目的索引鍵相等，就會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留項目具有相同索引鍵的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查詢運算式語法中， `orderby` (Visual C#) 或`Order By`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, an `orderby` (Visual C#) or `Order By` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來排序序列的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定識別函式 (`x => x` Visual C# 中或`Function(x) x`Visual Basic 中) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 若要擴充的型別定義兩個方法，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，讓您指定額外的排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 並`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或是的呼叫結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序，會忽略先前建立的順序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`已`null`，預設比較子用來比較索引鍵。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 這個方法會執行的穩定的排序;亦即，如果兩個項目的索引鍵相等，就會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留項目具有相同索引鍵的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定識別函式 (`x => x` Visual C# 中或`Function(x) x`Visual Basic 中) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 如需這個方法的範例，請參閱。For an example of this method, see . 若要擴充的型別定義兩個方法，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，讓您指定額外的排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 並`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或是的呼叫結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序，會忽略先前建立的順序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行的穩定的排序;亦即，如果兩個項目的索引鍵相等，就會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留項目具有相同索引鍵的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查詢運算式語法中， `orderby descending` (Visual C#) 或`Order By Descending`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, an `orderby descending` (Visual C#) or `Order By Descending` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法列舉輸入的序列中，使用轉換函式對應至每個項目，然後列舉，並產生每個這類的項目物件。The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是說，每個項目`source`，`selector`叫用，而且會傳回一連串的值。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然後將壓平合併成一維集合的這個二維集合並將它傳回。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 比方說，如果查詢使用取得訂單 (型別的`Order`) 資料庫中每位客戶，則結果為類型`IEnumerable`在 C# 或`IEnumerable(Of Order)`Visual Basic 中。For example, if a query uses to obtain the orders (of type `Order`) for each customer in a database, the result is of type `IEnumerable` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of Order)` in Visual Basic. 如果改為查詢使用若要取得的訂單，未合併的訂單集合的集合，且結果為型別的`IEnumerable>`在 C# 或`IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))`Visual Basic 中。If instead the query uses to obtain the orders, the collection of collections of orders is not combined and the result is of type `IEnumerable>` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` in Visual Basic. 在查詢運算式語法中，每個`from`子句 (Visual C#) 或`From`初始子句 (Visual Basic) 其中一個將轉譯的引動過程。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause (Visual Basic) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用對陣列進行反覆執行的一對多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`方法列舉兩個來源序列，以平行方式，並使用預設相等比較子來比較對應項目`TSource`， 。The `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method enumerates the two source sequences in parallel and compares corresponding elements by using the default equality comparer for `TSource`, . 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較類型的值。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要覆寫而方法，並選擇性地實作自訂型別中的泛型介面。To compare a custom data type, you need to override the and the methods, and optionally implement the generic interface in the custom type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`來判斷兩個序列是否相等。The following code examples demonstrate how to use `SequenceEqual(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to determine whether two sequences are equal. 在前兩個範例中，此方法會決定相比較的序列是否包含相同物件的參考。In the first two examples, the method determines whether the compared sequences contain references to the same objects. 在第三個和第四個範例中，這個方法會比較實際的資料序列中的物件。In the third and fourth examples, the method compares the actual data of the objects within the sequences. 在此範例中的序列相等。In this example the sequences are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#32)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#32)] 下列程式碼範例會比較不相等的兩個序列。The following code example compares two sequences that are not equal. 請注意，此序列會包含相同的資料，因為它們包含的物件有不同的參考，則不考慮其序列相等。Note that the sequences contain identical data, but because the objects that they contain have different references, the sequences are not considered equal. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#33)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#33)] 如果您想要比較的物件，而不是只比較其參考此序列中的實際資料，您必須實作類別中的泛型介面。If you want to compare the actual data of the objects in the sequences instead of just comparing their references, you have to implement the generic interface in your class. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面協助程式類別中，並提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a helper class and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#84](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#84)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#84](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#84)] 有時值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 除了檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並將它如有必要變更，您可以使用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫若要取得的項目。Then, call to obtain the element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值為 1，如果頁面號碼的集合是空的。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of page numbers is empty. 整數，預設值為 0，這是通常是有效的頁面編號，因為預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which is not usually a valid page number, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成執行後不必要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二個結果變數使用取得的指定預設值為 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 如果`source`包含少於`count`項目、 空白會傳回。If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty is returned. 如果`count`小於或等於零的所有項目`source`產生。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded. 和方法都是功能補充項目。The and methods are functional complements. 從指定的序列`coll`和一個整數`n`，串連的結果`coll.Take(n)`並`coll.Skip(n)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Skip`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用略過指定的已排序陣列中的元素數目，並傳回其餘項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#87](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#87)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#87)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法藉由使用延後的執行。The method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 這個方法會測試每個項目的`source`利用`predicate`，並略過的項目，如果結果是`true`。This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回之後`false`項目，該項目與中的其餘元素`source`產生且有沒有更多的引動過程的`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`會傳回`true`在順序中，空的所有項目的會傳回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 和方法都是功能補充項目。The and methods are functional complements. 從指定的序列`coll`和純虛擬函式`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`並`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Skip While`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用條件為 true 時，請略過陣列的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#88)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#88)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法會測試每個項目的`source`利用`predicate`，並略過的項目，如果結果是`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回之後`false`項目，該項目與中的其餘元素`source`產生且有沒有更多的引動過程的`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`會傳回`true`在順序中，空的所有項目的會傳回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 第一個引數`predicate`表示要測試的項目。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二個引數所代表的項目內的以零起始的索引`source`。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法都是功能補充項目。The and methods are functional complements. 從指定的序列`coll`和純虛擬函式`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`並`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Skip While`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用取決於項目的索引條件為 true 時，請略過陣列的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 列舉`source`產生項目，直到`count`項目已產生或`source`未包含多個項目。 enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements. 如果`count`超過中的項目數`source`的所有項目`source`會傳回。If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned. 如果`count`小於或等於零，`source`不是列舉和空白會傳回。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty is returned. 和方法都是功能補充項目。The and methods are functional complements. 從指定的序列`coll`和一個整數`n`，串連的結果`coll.Take(n)`並`coll.Skip(n)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Take`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用從序列開頭傳回項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定識別函式 (`x => x` Visual C# 中或`Function(x) x`Visual Basic 中) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 並定義為延伸類型，這也是一種方法的傳回型別。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此設計可讓您藉由套用任意數目的指定多個排序準則或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或是的呼叫結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序，會忽略先前建立的順序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行的穩定的排序;亦即，如果兩個項目的索引鍵相等，就會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留項目具有相同索引鍵的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查詢運算式語法中， `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) 或`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`(Visual Basic) 子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行次要排序序列中的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定識別函式 (`x => x` Visual C# 中或`Function(x) x`Visual Basic 中) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 並定義為延伸類型，這也是一種方法的傳回型別。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此設計可讓您藉由套用任意數目的指定多個排序準則或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或是的呼叫結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序，會忽略先前建立的順序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個排序方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This sorting method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行的穩定的排序;亦即，如果兩個項目的索引鍵相等，就會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留項目具有相同索引鍵的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在 Visual C# 查詢運算式語法中，`orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual C# query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending` clause translates to an invocation of . 在 Visual Basic 查詢運算式語法中，`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending`子句會轉譯成的引動過程。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, an `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending` clause translates to an invocation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 這個方法傳回集合中排除重複項目。This method excludes duplicates from the return set. 這是不同的行為，可方法，以包括重複項目輸入序列中傳回的所有項目。This is different behavior to the method, which returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates. 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值的類型可實作泛型介面。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要實作這個介面，並提供您自己和類型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 這個方法所傳回的物件列舉時，`Union`列舉`first`和`second`依此順序，並產生已產生每個項目。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, `Union` enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`來取得整數的兩個序列的聯集。The following code example demonstrates how to use `Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` to obtain the union of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp-interactive[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#109)] 如果您想要比較之物件的某些自訂資料類型的序列，您必須實作協助程式類別中的泛型介面。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂資料型別中實作此介面並覆寫和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and override and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#9)] 您實作這個介面之後，您可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的物件`Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)`方法，如下列範例所示：After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the `Union(IEnumerable, IEnumerable)` method, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#10)] [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存，才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件可以藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或透過`foreach`Visual C# 中或`For Each`Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法會將合併的第一個序列的每個項目，與第二個序列中具有相同索引的項目。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列沒有相同數目的項目，方法，直到它到達結尾的其中一個，就會合併序列。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一個序列具有三個項目，另一個有四個結果序列必須只有三個項目。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來合併兩個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#200)]
